mean_en: a reciprocal relation between interdependent entities (objects or individuals or groups)
word_etyma: inter相互+depend依靠+ency表名词 → 互相依赖
short_phrase: the interdependency of Yin and Yang
sentence: The Yin-Yang symbol illustrates the interdependency of Yin and Yang.
sentence_trans: 这个八卦符号阐释了阴和阳的相互依赖性。
sentence_phrase: the interdependency of Yin and Yang
